capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches everywhere. I mean, who wouldn't want to be just as brave and wise as she is? The way she can transform into a cat at will is just incredible! And let's not forget about her sharp wit and quick thinking - she's always got everyone's back in times of need.
